companyName: Bassi, Vreeland & Associates, P.C. - Washington, PA

moreBlocks.websites: https://www.bmvlaw.com https://www.bmvlaw.com https://www.bmvlaw.com/blog/

moreBlocks.otherOffices: Bassi, Vreeland & Associates, P.C. (Main Office) 111 Fallowfield Avenue P.O. Box 144 Charleroi, PA 15022 - 0144 724-705-0146

description:
If you live in Washington County or anywhere in southwestern Pennsylvania, and you have a serious or complex civil issue affecting your life, your livelihood, your business or your family, you can turn to the legal professionals at Bassi, Vreeland & Associates, P.C., in Washington for the quality, effective representation you deserve.

With a history that dates back more than 70 years, we are one of the oldest and most respected law firms in the region, and we have two law offices in Washington County, each offering convenient access to the personalized counsel, aggressive advocacy and compassionate support you need.

Serving a diverse range of clients across the area, the attorneys at our law firm possess decades of combined legal experience, and we all work together as a team, collaborating to leverage our respective strengths in order to deliver the most effective solutions possible for your legal challenges involving personal injury, family law, estate planning and administration, real estate and title insurance, and more. We also assist business owners with all aspects of business law and general litigation.

Having won the People's Choice Award from the Observer-Reporter in 2017, Bassi, Vreeland & Associates, P.C., is a local firm you can trust with your most sensitive legal issues, and we promise to do whatever we can to help you achieve the favorable outcomes you seek. For more information, you can contact our law office to schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation.
